ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Easy Lambent BP
ygData.msgSnippet: Dude -- The easy way is to save up the 800 or so plat that it sells for and buy it.  Doing the quest takes work.  But truthfully, I found doing the BP easier
ygData.messageBody:
Dude --
The easy way is to save up the 800 or so plat that it sells for and buy it. Doing the quest takes work. But truthfully, I found doing the BP easier than the bracers.

uluvaas <lreynolf@...> wrote: Hail All,

My name is Uluvaas, Elven Bard of the 11th Song. I have just
recently joined this fine establishment. But anyway, I was looking
for some help. I need to find an easy way to get a lambent bp to
finish off my suit but dont have any available platinum. If some
could please help, i'm on the Lanys Tv'yl server, usually on
between 1:00 P.M. - 2:00 P.M. central time.

"Without music life would be a mistake." - Friedrich Nietzsche
(1844-1900)

Uluvaas
Woodland Bard of the 11th Song
Lanys Tv'yl
